content.detailedDescription: Now i know this is gonna sound crazy but this is what happened to me and my cousin about 1990. i lived in a housing project in maryland at he time. there was a playground that consisted of a swing set and a tube slide. it was situated behind my cousin's house below a hill. included was asphalt basketball court about 15 directly in front of it. behind the playground was a railroad yard that had a fence blocking it off from the housing project. the time was about a little after 8pm you could see the sun was in the process of setting. me and my female cousin who was about 9 or 10 at the time . i was walking over to my aunts house when i seen my cousin on the swing-set. i proceeded to walk over and get on the other swing. on the basketball court about 75 feet from where we were swinging there was 3 guys who had set up a ramp with a piece of ply-board and a cinder block. they had a old dirt-bike and jumping the ramp. as we were swinging i leaned way back on the swing and that was when i noticed the object. behind us and about a couple hundred feet above the railroad yard was a glowing ball of light. i stopped swinging and turned while still sitting on the swing to see the object and that is when it came toward us at a high rate of speed. the ball descended as it approached us till it was directly in front of us about five feet.The ball was a little bit bigger than a basketball. i don't understand this till this day but me and my cousin didn't react at all. we didn't even say anything we just stared at this ball of light that was rapidly changing colors. i turned every color in the the color spectrum we continued to stare at the object and it began to come toward us then go between us then circle around us then stop back in front of us. there was a sudden flash of white light and it was gone. when the object was going around us the guys riding the dirt-bike didn't seem to notice this happening. but i could see them because as the ball went around us we continued to stare straight ahead. after the flash the guys were gone and it was almost dark. i didn't understand what happened and just sat on the swing. i know it doesn't make sense but me and my cousin didn't even say one word to each other. we just got off the swings and started to walk to our homes. for some reason i never said one word about this to anyone till 1998 when i seen my cousin at her brother's house. for some reason it just didn't seem like a big deal. over the years i convinced myself it was a dream. i asked my cousin just straight out do you remember when we were kids and before i could finish my words she finished them for me. she said when we seen that ball of light. we both just stared at each other for about about a couple of seconds and both repeated i thought that was a dream. she asked me what it was and i said i have no idea. we continued to compare memories and they we ex-actually the same. sadly she was killed in 1999 in a car accident. i never got another chance to speak to her about it. i never got to see her that much as we grew older we grew apart. i have never told anyone about this but my wife. i had some other weird things happen to me when i was a kid before this incident but it would take me to long to write about it. i have a 6 year old daughter and she had recently told me of a dream she had of blue aliens in blue jump suits like on cartoons coming to her and taking her and me with them. she said they were nice to us. i don't remember this but i know my daughter she may only be 6 buy she doesn't lie or make up stories. well that's my story belive it or not but i know it happened. i think me and my cousin may have lost about 45 minutes between when we first seen the object and then the white flash. but i asked her and we both don't remember anything.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Multiple colored ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
august 6 2013 i saw another star like object by my home. i live in the country in fowler,ca. before this i was able to see three more just like it. they usually come around the same time after 9:00 pm.
sometimes you just never know when they will come. so, i wait looking up at the night sky. it usually happens when i notice a gold star that shows up then slowly it descends down towards me/house. it then looks bigger and a little brighter. then, it veers off a little heading over the grape vineyards heading ne keeping the same slow speed. it's not an orb with colors. it's not a white solid dot in the sky that zig zags around or hovers. it does not flash and is not a drone. it just looks like a star with those points of light extending out like a star would look in the night sky. i happened to see my first one a few months back it was even lower i would say not over two telephone poles high. but, that first star like object was all white not gold like these others and these are not shooting stars. i cannot find anything similar on the web. i did witness the same object earlier during this week that was so large and descending down again towards my home that i thought it was going to hit the house. i think i am seeing something different and amazing. is this a natural phenomenon or something else? i do not own a video camera or i would show a video. i hope i will be able to borrow one soon.  this is truly an amazing sight to see. i see other things in the sky but, i will save for another time. thank you.
content.summary: Looked like a gold star with those points of light. no sound. kept same speed slow, gliding gracefully over the grape vineyards. object looked very lightweight. maybe the size of a small car or so. no colored lights. was glowing like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
August 4, 2013

witnesses: 4

time of sighting: 9:08 pm - 9:14 pm

weather: very light/gentle breeze, no clouds

i was hanging out with my friends 1, 2, and 3. we were really bored and trying to find something to do. we decided to take a hike up miwok hill, my favorite place in novato, but it was cloudy and raining there. we then made a quick decision to hangout at my friends house in ignacio, which wasn't too far away.

[9:08 pm]
as we reached the other side of town i noticed that there were no clouds anymore��� no rain, nothing. just as we were coming down the hill by san jose middle school i noticed a strange white orb in the sky that appeared to be moving. in the near distance was a plane that i could compare it to. they were completely different.

as we got further down the hill my friend #1 shouts to everyone in the car. 

"what is that!"

he pointed right at the orb i was looking at. we decided to pull over at the school parking lot and watch. the orb was slowly moving in a straight line from the indian valley preserve, almost directly above us, towards the redwood highway. my friend #2 tells me to grab my camera. i rush to the trunk of the car and set it up. he parks his car and everyone gets out to watch.

i begin recording around [9:10 pm]. i mention almost immediately that this could be the same thing, referring to the other sightings from july 14, 21, & 22. i then tell everyone to be quite and just listen. at 00:23 in the video you can hear the plane i was speaking of earlier. at 00:30 you can hear friend #3 say that right there is a plane and #1 saying that he could hear the plane over there. the orb itself was making no noise.

friend #3 then mentions that he say the light in a triangle just before, i replied, "really?" but i watched the light longer than him and saw no triangles or triangle formations.

at 01:01 friend #1 says that it looks like one solid light and at 01:06 i reply that it is indeed one solid light.

at around 01:10 in the video i begin to get really excited as i realize this is indeed another ufo. i ask everyone if they hear anything and then tell them to be quiet in the excitement. at 01:17 friend #2 mentions that there are no flashing lights and that he doesn't hear anything. there is no noise, he repeats.

i then say that i too hear nothing. no noise. and its almost directly above us!

i mention soon after (around 01:48 in the video) that i feel like i can reach out and touch it because it was so close to us and low to the ground.

from 02:01 to 02:17 it appears to emit a blue aura which i saw with my own eyes and not just the camera. during the filming of this sighting, i periodically looked up with my own eyes then went back to filming. this is why the footage is a bit shaky at moments. but the blue aura was quite strange!

at 02:39 it passes through a tree. 

at 3:04 i pass the camera to friend #3 so that i can spend the rest of the sighting watching the object with my own eyes.

at 03:25 i ask if anyone saw a shape. i mentioned that i saw more of the ship but only the one light was showing, i was referring to the blue aura. friend #3 mentioned it looked like a jet at 03:28 and then that it looked like a jellyfish at 03:37. i don't think that friend #3 saw anything though. he has bad eyesight and has now mentioned the object to take on 3 different shapes.

at 03:38 i ask "how can this happen this often?" referring to the fact that this is my 4th sighting since july 14 of the previous month in the same town.

i ask for a timestamp at 03:43 and friend #2 mentions that it is [09:13 pm]

at 04:31 in the video it reaches the horizon. we try to run back to see the ufo for a short while longer. i take back the camera and try to film it more. 

at 04:55 i stop recording. the next part of the video is us in the car trying to follow the object that is now out of sight.


attached is the original footage, the enhanced footage, and a map of the flight path.
content.summary: White orb slowly floating above very close to the ground

content.detailedDescription: I was making a video then my dad called me to go outside and told me to look up and i saw a triangle and the lights were blue and switching it was spinning and hovering. i was frightened and also amazed. i lost site when it went across the trees behind my garage.
content.summary: Happened at night

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Earlier in the day as i stepped outside my apartment, i observed what i at first thought was a seagull flying through the skies in front of me until it caught my attention by stopping and going backwards and hovering then going forward then stopping and going backwards again before taking off behind the trees out of sight. nothing else unusual was seen until approximately 10:45 p.M. that night when my son, justin, and i went for our nighttime jog at the bremerton highschool track nearby. we walked a lap before jogging and during the second lap we noticed a very bright, star-like object appear out of nowhere in the sky directly ahead of us, moving slowly east and changing directions coming right towards where we were at almost as though it knew we were there. it slowly approached and hovered right above us, glowing intensely for approximately 3 minutes before slowly moving northwesterly. justin videotaped the object as it approached us and hovered above us, until it could no longer be seen. about a couple minutes soon afterwards, a helicopter came from the direction the object appeared initially and a second helicopter approached from the direction where the object was last seen. two more helicopters were seen in the distance nearby. about 5 minutes later as we continued with our jog around the lap, we saw what i can only describe as an electrical arc "smudge" flashed in the sky to the right of us a short distance away. then an object appeared from where the flash was seen from the "smudge" and it slowly moved northeasterly and disappeared. sporadic flashes were seen and we observed 2 jets approaching quickly towards the area where the helicopters were at, which there were now at least 6-8 of them. as we were leaving, we observed another object moving in the skies while we were sitting in the car, so we decided to drive to an area without lights so we can pull over and watch the activity going on. we stood near the warren ave. bridge in a residential area by the waterside where we had a great view of the whole city. i am not exaggerating when i say that the scene now was like as though we were under attack. it looked like something huge was happening and the helicopters were the news crew filming. it was crazy. we then noticed a formation of 5 objects in a sloping pattern, equally distanced apart from each other. the slope was like the curve if you were to connect the dots to 3 o'clock, 4 o'clock, all the way up to 7 o.Clock on a clock face. it spanned about maybe 3-4 miles in length up in the sky. it was hard to tell exactly how long it was. and flashes of light were coming from the space between each object in the formation. it was not a huge craft. it appeared to just be a formation. flashes and sporadic fireballs in reds and blues appeared randomly and 1 stationary pulsating greenish white object hovering to the north very low, maybe treetops height, maybe only 2 miles away. the helicopters were hovering, seemingly observing these objects. there were about 4 jets in total that came to the area. objects appeared out of nowhere, disappeared and reappeared and some glowed intensely before rapidly ascending into the sky. we counted more than 20 objects in the area  not including the formation. we left after observing the action for a good hour. unfortunately our cell phones died. not sure if it had anything to do with phenomena. my phone had power but was not turning on. i was going to listen to music while jogging. i also have to mention a weird occurrence when we first got to the track, prior to our experiences. not sure if it is anything but it was kind of scary. when we stepped down into the field track from the entrance stairs, we saw a husky-build male walking slowly with his head down, looking at the ground. with the lights overhead we can only see his silhouette. we stood there as he approached near us, still walking in the lap looking down. i said, "hello," to the man. he looked up but didn't say anything and he had an angry, almost menacing look on his face. he scowled at us and looked away, i told justin that maybe he had headphones on or something and just didn't hear us, though i could see that he didn't. my son asked me if we should just come back another night because he was somewhat nervous about being around that creepy man. i said we'd be fine. and when the guy was a short distance in front of us, we proceeded to walk around the lap to warm up. we spotted another hefty-looking silouhette of another possible male, sitting in the dark just ahead on the grass next to the track. we never saw this guy in detail. what was strange was the fact that as the first man neared where that guy sat, they seemed to have both just vanish. we were not too far behind them and i don't recall seeing the two men together at all. there was enough lighting to see but it is still dim there at night. nevertheless, we still would have been able to see them. we were keeping an eye on them just to be safe. we were hesitant to even be there after that creepy encounter when we first got there. i asked justin if he saw where they went to and he didn't. we don't know how they disappeared or where they went. it was unnerving. i'm thinking we're going to get jumped, attacked, or whatever. that first guy seemed like a mean person. not friendly at all. he wore regular jeans and a t-shirt. he didn't look like the typical person one would encounter doing laps around a track. and now we were thinking he's got an accomplice and they're both somewhere in the dark, watching us. but i'm telling you! i never took my eyes off of them. but they just seemed to have just vanished into thin air. i am a woman, in a dark place at night. i wasn't alone, but still, i was being very aware of my surroundings. my son and i were really tripping the whole time we were there. we were constantly looking all around us, expecting them to pop out at us at any given moment. and the other weird thing that night, was the fact that i was in the middle of telling justin a story about 2 ufos that swooped down fast and came right to me, and i was pointing to where they were at the time in the sky, and coincidentally, it was the same exact spot where the star-like object appeared and hovered over me and justin that night! the night's activity remained active even after my son dropped me off at my apartment. from the front patio, an object appeared and ascended slowly right behind the trees down the street, along with another helicopter. my neighbor came out to smoke a cigarette, and asked how my jog went with my son. i told her the crazy story and even pointed out the object just in front of us. she went to get her boyfriend, and they both witnessed the flashes, and objects appearing and disappearing, and moving in the skies and even the pulsating object that appeared from behind the trees. i told them about the 5 object formation and took them to the street to see if we can see it, and sure enough, there it was. they witnessed a few flashes and several objects, in the way i had described them happening. we observed the hovering object through my binoculars. it was pulsating green and white. and only through the binoculars, we also was able to see objects moving through the skies that we couldn't see with our naked eyes. as i write this report which is the 7th on the following day in the afternoon, there is a helicopter hovering above the highschool which is where justin and i went jogging. also observed a strange drone-like plane with a green nose, white body, flying directly overhead.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Daylight object observed near my apartment. whitish/grey with blurred "field" surrounding it. went forward and backwards, hovering and then disappearing behind trees. heavy ufo activity later on at night, accompanied by jets and lots of helicopters.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?At that time we were preparing to travel

2. what made you first notice the object? we were warned that approaching lights were coming from the north

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?It was impressive to see many rose i see achieved for 20 seconds before it was lost

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail i saw a very large light yellow oval 2400 feet long by 600 feet high moving from the north to the northeast without noise and the light were coming behind seven smaller lights of blue and red without noise the red up and blue flying very neatly down i was about 8-10 kilometers away latitude -18.053844 longitude coordinates -69.201639 at 4,400 meters above sea level

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the objecti was impressed and thoughtful also proposed to send a vehicle to the area to investigate but it was not possible because there are no roads in that part of the world

6. how did you lose sight of the object? the objects followed a straight path and got lost in the mountains to the east
content.summary: Big yellow light followed by 7 lights blue and red colors

content.detailedDescription: Putting the dogs out back door. as always was scanning the sky for something different. it was a white orb moving from south to north, slightly to my east. moving with total silence. it seemed to be cruising pretty slow. it disappeared within 5 min.I have been seeing them for as long as i have been in the highland lakes area, 30 years. i believe there to be an observing ufo between lake lbj and lake travis, many years.
content.summary: I looked up it was moving silently south to north a mile or so east of me.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On the night of august 6th, 2013 approximately around 10:10pm i was sitting outside on the cordless phone. the night skies were clear and all that can be seen were stars, an occasional airplane and a satellite far off in the distance. 

i had first viewed this very bright and bold orange light that was just above the sea grass that borders the marsh. this grass is about 12ft tall and from my sitting position i would guess it was maybe 35 degrees or more from the horizon. just a guess not exactly sure the exact position. at first i thought i could have been a plane but the color was too bright and big to be that of a plane. the object moved from east to west and at times sped up and also stopped and hovered. then it would move again and eventually the light would dim and vanish. after the first light came several others. one at a time and some in groups of three or four. all totaling about maybe a dozen. some of these lights seemed to chase after one another. always moved in same direction from east to west. some of these lights again would move at a great rate of speed....Then stop and be motionless and then move again. one point was two of these lights hovering one above the other after the trailing light has chased and caught up to the one in front of it. 

this all occurred for approx. 20-30 minutes and came in intervals. they all were in the same flight path or trajectory of their movement in the sky. all were not at the same altitude. i had no idea of what i was looking at and amazed at what i had seen. i remember seeing such a bright orange light such as this when i was just a small child perhaps 6-8 years old. all of these objects had either left at such a rate of speed that the lights dimmed and vanished or the bright light just disappeared completely like a light switch.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Bright orange lights viewed in northern position traveling east to west. seem to chase/follow/hover then dim and disappear in similar patterns

content.detailedDescription:
I went into another room around 10 pm and glanced out the northern window and noticed the stars were really bright outside.  i thought about the brightness and decided to get my binoculars out and see what i could see.  

i saw around 10 objects in the sky and particularly 3 objects, perhaps slightly triangle in shape and the size of an aspirin with the binoculars  they appeared to look stationary in the sky.  so,  what i saw was 3 objects that were round balls of bright white light that would dim and blink off, but not at the same time and it appeared to have a rhythm.  the other 7 were separate and away from the rest which did the same but were not grouped together in any way.  

at first i thought the 3 were stationary, but they were not they were moving north and east ultra slowly.  i live near camp gruber which is the training center for the national guard and wondered if perhaps they had something to do with this?

this did not bother me at all, after watching for around 1 hour i went to bed.  my digital camera's battery was needing a recharge so i did not get any pictures of this.  i decided to report this anyway.   during the night i got up and went to get a drink and there was nothing in the sky but stars at 3 am. 

i do believe i will watch the sky a whole lot more than i am doing..  for it is becoming very interesting.
content.summary: I saw around 10 white orbs in the sky, i think that is what they are called.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were headed home.  we were stopped at 56th and pecos facing east and waiting to turn north.  as we were waiting at the light my wife spotted what she thought was a small black helicopter above and to the right of her/southeast and heading northeast.  she originally assumed it was trying to land, but then the object continued in the same direction apparently not wanting to land.  she thought i also had seen it, but i hadn't. she then alerted me to the fact that she had seen it and i looked directly ahead east and at a 30 degree angle above horizon it was only 2/10 a mile away.  it continued to glide in a northeast direction and about 200' above ground. i then went through the light straight instead of turning to get a better view.  this was on impulse as it would have been better to turn north towards highway 1-76.  this was do to the fact that the object continued northeast and out of view when i pulled into a dead end parking lot.  i then went north to pursue this object.  just two blocks north we spotted the object again heading in the same direction. we were on pecos street bridge this object continued towards a local gardening store paulinos  as it reached this area it stopped and returned slowly in our direction and at the same time appeared to change shape and became a flat upward thin line then reformed and continued toward our direction northwest.  it then slowly changed direction back to the northeast heading it originally had.  it was then gliding directly next to 1-76.  it looked as if it had attempted to land at one point not far from 1-76 and 1-25 confluence coming no more than 40' feet from ground.  granted we were now watching it at probably close to a mile from us.  so distance from ground would be hard to guess.  it then slowly glided back in northeast direction were we continued to observe it gliding along 1-76 a couple more miles.  this object seemed to be under control.  we assumed it was either a small manmade craft or balloons possibly but the object was not making a sound and it had a definite path unlike a bunch of balloons.  it never accelerated rapidly but did turn/dive and rotate.  when rotating it seemed to morph into a thin black line.  most of the time it looked like a snowman with no head and solid black.  this object was very intriguing, so much so that i instantly had to pursue it.  going in the wrong direction from what i should have just to try seeing it better.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was balloons looked under control changed direction/shape/elevation it was black w/ two levels bottombigger than top and looked like a kong toy

content.detailedDescription: It was 2 - 2- 2013 at around 3:15 pm,i was in my backyard, i looked up in the sky at an jet airliner flying west bound from hollywood/ ft. lauderdale  airport  when i noticed just up higher in the sky a shiny object, it looked like a shinning star, but it was daytime. so i went and got my nikon active 10- 22x50 binoculars and i got to see it clear, it was a silver shiny craft, it had like an energy field glowing around with red glow on top of what looked like a dome but the craft was saucer shaped. after observing for about 20 min a big cloud moved in so my vision was obstructed, when the cloud moved away the craft was gone. imidiatly after a gray twin prop engine plane started to fly in circles high up, it looked like a us navy plane but it had no markings anywhere, it flew circles for 45 min, then moved east toward the ocean and presided to fly in circles for 15 min , after flew south east....... this incident change my life, i now know for sure that we are not alone , the government knows about them .
content.summary: Ufo high in the sky over south florida, daytime sighting.

content.detailedDescription: It was 2 - 2- 2013 at around 3:15 pm,i was in my backyard, i looked up in the sky at an jet airliner flying west bound from hollywood/ ft. lauderdale  airport  when i noticed just up higher in the sky a shiny object, it looked like a shinning star, but it was daytime. so i went and got my nikon active 10- 22x50 binoculars and i got to see it clear, it was a silver shiny craft, it had like an energy field glowing around with red glow on top of what looked like a dome but the craft was saucer shaped. after observing for about 20 min a big cloud moved in so my vision was obstructed, when the cloud moved away the craft was gone. imidiatly after a gray twin prop engine plane started to fly in circles high up, it looked like a us navy plane but it had no markings anywhere, it flew circles for 45 min, then moved east toward the ocean and presided to fly in circles for 15 min , after flew south east....... this incident change my life, i now know for sure that we are not alone , the government knows about them .
content.summary: Ufo high in the sky over south florida, daytime sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
i am writing this now, 2 days after the event. i have read of others seeing this same object, and i'm submitting my report to help anyone investigating to perhaps establish a time line.
 i was star gazing during the evening of 8-5-13. at 10:40 pm., i witnessed a large, very bright white star like object appear in the west over erie, pa. it was moving directly at me at a steady, fairly fast speed. i yelled for my wife, and she grabbed her digital camera, and ran out of the house to join me. by the time she reached me in our driveway, the object was directly overhead. the object continued to move eastward, and we watched it until it disappeared from our sight.
 my wife clicked multiple pictures, but nothing appeared in her olympus digital camera. maybe this camera is not good for this type of images.  
 this is my second report within the past two weeks for events in erie pa. we have seen other objects this year around erie, but i was not aware of this reporting sight.
content.summary: Very bright, star like, but very huge compared to the brightest stars.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my uncle's back porch smoking a cigarette, looking at the sky because it is pitch black on his property. i was looking for ufo's because in fl there is too much light pollution. i noticed several planes in the area because it is near fort knox. i kept noticing what appeared to be stars darting around the sky. i focused on a particularly bright one and it began to move. i couldn't tell exactly how far from earth it was, whether it was in our atmosphere or just above it, but i could make out the object very clearly regardless. the object would come to a complete stop in the sky before darting either forwards, backwards, or sideways, and then returning to a complete stop. it seemed to be pulsating, with every color in the spectrum being emitted from the craft. i don't know exactly how large the craft was, but it appeared to be roughly the size of a small plane. after it would move, a faint trail could be seen behind it briefly before it dissipated. i have been waiting to see a ufo for about a decade now, and i was freaking out. i ran inside and told my mom, "hurry, come outside right now, i have to show you something." i came back outside with her and the object was still near the same spot where i had seen it before. i told my mom to look at the light and follow it closely. she observed the same thing that i did. she said it looked like, "minnows in a stream". i noticed several other objects in the surrounding sky imitating the same behavior. my mother also saw them. i am 27 years old with excellent eyesight, and she is 59 with pretty bad eyesight, and she could still clearly see this craft moving in the sky. it was most certainly not a plane or jet or helicopter or any craft known to the people of this world. after observing the craft for several minutes, we went inside. i came back outside about a half hour later, and the original craft i had been watching was gone, but i noticed several others. i was overwhelmed with excitement and did not sleep at all that night.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Objects darting quickly in sky then coming to complete stop, then darting in other directions, stopping, repeating.

content.detailedDescription:
We were meeting with a friend at the park standing aroun talking and watching the sky smoking a cigarette when one of us noticed something strange moving almost like a satellite. 

it was noticed because it was the brightest object in the sky. 

at first we thought it to be a satellite, before notching it was to low ad moving to fast. 

the object was round in shape with a blueish-white glow, it was roughly twice the size of any star in the sky. it made no sound and its light did not pulsate or twinkle. it was traveling about three times that of a satellite and was going in a straight line before changing course. it was observed coming from the sw heading ne before heading due east. 

when we first realized we were seeing something we were shocked we had never seen anything like this before and couldn't believe we were seeig something we could not explain. 
i attempted to film the object but with only my iphone i was not able to capture the light. 

we lost sight of the object after it changed course and headed east over the tree line.
content.summary: Glowing orb observed heading ne then abroptly changed to east before disappearing over tree line

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for the bus at varsity lakes station when i noticed a muted led type light flying at cruise speed in a northerly direction. at first i assumed it was a light airplane, with the sun reflecting off it, as it was a beautiful, clear winter afternoon. i've observed that phenomena before, but usually when the plane passes it will change shading according to its relation to the sun. this was a constant glow. a minute later, a second identical object passed over, following the exact same trajectory. i then saw a third and got a better look as it was closer to my position. it seemed to either be rotating its light or there may have been a couple flicking in sequence, on the same object. i also noticed a kind of blur or heat effect around it. all three light travelled until i lost visibility. no sound. hardly any breeze, as i mentioned a clear and warm afternoon, especially for winter. i would love to know if anyone else saw these.
content.summary: Observed 3 lights, equidistant, approximately 1 min apart in clear daylight. appeared led-like, moving in a straight trajectory, fading into the distance.

content.detailedDescription: 8/6/2013 at 8:80 pm i was sitting outside on my stairs smoking a cig and i was looking for stars when i saw this bright light over long beach area.  i first thought it was a plane or a helicopter but it wasn't moving no sound that i can hear it stayed in the sky for about ten to twenty minutes i went inside and got my cell phone to take a photo.  i took the photo then went inside i went back out about a half hour later and it was gone. i looked on the internet for a white light in the area  i found nothing i will check in the morning.
content.summary: Sphere shape bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
Star like object, moved like a fish in a fish tank.  swim a way in fish like motion, then stop.  a small object broke off, swam like a baby fish and then rejoined the main star like object.  i would guess they were outside the atmosphere, satellite distance.  i thought it was most likely sun reflection on the objects, not any lights.  seemed organic.  in the end, stopped completely and "pretended" to be a star.  i didn't wait out the staring contest.  frustrated no one else saw it.  i made multiple calls for people to look, no one answered.  does anyone else ever look up?

weirded me out.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star like object swimming like fish - also baby

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We was talking in my front porch, it was a clear sky and i saw something move in the corner of my eye up in the sky, then i said look guys including my wife, we all saw these object moving all kind of directions and like it  was controlled. then my friend went home told his wife, they grabbed his video cam and watched. then about 10:pm a big object quietly came across his side of the town he got it on cam, 3 second later it came over my home and hovered quietly. it was so smooth and bright very bright no noise at all.  and it was going to a certain location. i felt happy because it was not the first time ive seen things like this at my home i needed proof and witness, now is the time. my wife and i saw one like two years ago it was like morphing and went the same direction like this one we saw on aug 5, 2013. last night. we have proof of object but its going to take a few day to download.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw it and we took pictures and my friend video taped the event.

content.detailedDescription:
1. sitting on my friend's porch with her and her husband, looking northeast, i see a slow moving "shooting star" going southwest and say so. it disappears behind a tree, both her and hubby say they missed it. i spot it again on the other side of the large tree, point it out, they see it. friend says it looks like a bug but then it goes behind a tall light transformer and changes all of our perspectives of what we were seeing. coming out from the tree outline to begin with was now heading evenly northwest. it was moving slow enough for us to talk about it as we were watching it. it was moving out of our sight distance when suddenly it changed direction again to the direct north and finally went out of our sight, fading in light. and so it was gone.

2. thought it was a shooting star.

3. see above.

4. see first answer.

5. incredulous at what we were seeing.

6. it moved out of our sight distance.
content.summary: Thought it was a bug but then it was clear we were seeing something intelligent

content.detailedDescription: At 10:20 pm, 21jul13, witness (a) observed a red pulsating, diamond shaped, light traveling south, then turned westward, at approximately 2000 foot altitude. (voice mail submission)
content.summary: Red pulsating, diamond shaped, light traveling south, then turned westward

content.detailedDescription:
1- americas tower, i was tourist
2- next day, analyzed pics
3- over the tower, high sky
content.summary: White dots over san antonio

content.detailedDescription:
Was out walking my dogs at night. for the past few weeks i've been watching the sky for ufos and usually can distinguish what is a plane or not by the blinking lights on the bottom of the aircraft, and that's what i have been seeing often that i thought was weird. but i was eyeing the sky tonight (this was coincidental since my phone was out of battery so i couldn't record or photograph.) but, as a skeptic, i was eyeing this object as a plane, but then the object light dims in for a brief second, and then out again. it looked like it was traveling due east. this went on for a short duration  and then the dimming stopped and the object was gone.
 i was sort of stunned and surprised by the whole sighting - i have been watching the skies for a while and seen weird things, that i quickly pointed them out as planes, so when i saw that there were no blinking lights emitting from the object, i continued to watch as it dimmed in and out and again and then stopped, with me losing track of it.
content.summary: Odd light dimming in and out

content.detailedDescription: Standing in my backyard looking east. noticed bright glowing orange/red balls of light rising up into the sky, one at a time and in clusters. the balls appeared coordinated with some moving toward others to form triangles. appeared these were originating from near or over lake michigan, approx 3 miles away. i ran inside to get my mother, she also witnessed the rising glowing lights. the lights floated up towards the north/northwest sky and disappeared. total number of lights i saw was approx 30 or more. duration was approx 20-25 mins. a commercial airplane departing o'hare heading northeast was about a mile south of my location facing the glowing balls at the time of my witnessing the event. it looked as if they were glowing fire embers rising off the lake.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Clusters of glowing orange/red balls ascending over lake michigan

content.detailedDescription: Saw something crazy and amazing last night. never thought i would ever see anything like that in my lifetime. so about 12-12:30 last night i was driving back to maxwell and when i got about 5 miles out i was watching an airplane. as i get closer i notice that the airplane is barely moving, but of course all i see is the lights from that distance and because of how dark it was. i get over the overpass and start driving into maxwell and pull over to look at this odd-flying airplane, i notice that it is just 60 yards away and only about the size of a crown vic (for those of you that dont know what a crown vic is it is a large car that will seat 5-6 people....Or just think of something your grandmother would drive lol). anyway this airplane is hovering over the trees right on the other side of the train tracks, not moving at all other than maybe a little swaying back and forth. it sits there for a minute and then slowly starts moving to the west (toward north platte) i was amazed when i realized that this wasn't something from this world, i saw a ufo.My heart was pounding and hair standing on end from excitement. i followed it, speeding back to the west side of the overpass to catch up with it i just wanted one more glimps to confirm what i had already realized. i watch it in the distance as i am driving on the overpass. i lose sight of it behind a tree grove and when i come out the other side i can see all the way to north platte but it has vanished. so why was it hovering so low over the trees in the very small village of maxwell, ne? why did it not seem to mind that we were watching it even when i made it very obvious that we did see it? and why was it moving so slow and seem to be sticking to the south side of the highway the entire time? looking for something, damaged aircraft from the storm we had maybe? i don't know but it left my mind pondering, searching for answers.
content.summary: Amazing, like they didn't care that we were watching them. seemed as though they were looking for something.

content.detailedDescription: We were out walking the dog down the street and my friend and i noticed the brightness of the light.  but it made no sound. it was moving in a straight line across in front of us. there was a silver disc shaped object behind the light.  we do have helicopters and airplanes that fly by often but this object made no sound.
content.summary: Silver object with light in front but made no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along the harbourside promenade heading west with the harbour on my left (south) and looking over the water at several boats when i noticed a very bright white narrow ovular shaped object in the sky over the harbour.  it was difficult to determine if it was moving so i stopped walking and watched it. i thought it was reflecting the light as do airplanes high in the sky. it did not have wings or a tail. there was no sound what-so-ever, but i kept listening intently.  there was no emission stream behind it, but there seemed to be feathery dark grey mists around it but not near it.  otherwise the sky was clear, but for the darker area around it. it seemed to be either hovering or moving very slowly toward the east.  the object seemed to be at a 45 degree angle upward from where i stood, and perhaps several thousand feet up, but very difficult to determine.
after about a minute, i could hear a plane approaching from the west toward the east basically along the same path as the object but moving much more quickly. i saw the plane's wings, jet-stream, and how it reflected the evening light as a bright white, but not as brightly as the object i was watching. i wondered if the object was a metallic helium balloon, but it wasn't the usual circular or teardrop shape of one. i wondered if it was a helicopter very distant, but they are usually red, orange or black and i've never seen one reflect light like this object.
the object started to dim in brightness and outline, and i noticed a dark area around it's middle. it didn't change altitude and was still moving slowly. i glanced briefly at another plane approaching and looked back to where the object had been and it was completely gone and the sky was a clean blue where it had been. i was completely surprised and gasped aloud. i watched the sky for another minute and then started walking again...Looking toward the area where it had been and in other directions. it didn't reappear.
content.summary: One very bright white narrow ovular object hovered over harbour, moved slowly east, faded, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Walking my dog about 10 p.M. and looking at western horizon observing a bright star.  then notice just below the star a brilliant white object that looked like a star moving in a steady horizontal path just underneath the stationary star.  watched it thinking it could be a plane, then it stopped and quickly just disappeared, seemingly with a small light streak.  was wondering what i saw when another object just like the first appeared at same position as the first object moved in same path then also quickly disappeared, seemingly leaving the atmosphere, light was just gone.
content.summary: Saw 2 star like objects mid horizon to the west,  straight horizontal path, then seemed to turn and leave atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: Was driving first saw 2 then pulled over and witnessed up to ten glowing red objects floating across the sky then disappeared.  got video
content.summary: Pewaukee 11pm saw up to ten red glowing objects

content.detailedDescription: Since i was a kid i was always interested in space and what was in it so i would often go outside at night and watch the stars. i have seen hundreds of sattelites and shooting stars and occasionally a few ufo's but one night i was outside in my front yard looking at the sky, i saw what looked like a sattelite moving across the sky. but i knew it wasnt a sattelite because while it was moving it just disappeared, then it reappeared further along its path, which was a straight line, but as it reappeared a trail of light started to appear bewtween where it reappeared and where it disappeared. it looked to me like it was teleporting, disappear from one place then appear in another place and leave a trail in between the two spots, it did this a few times but then one time it disappeared it didnt appear again, i walked around my yard to see if i could find it but i never saw it. when i first saw it i was excited and surprised at what i had seen. when it disappeared and didnt come back i wondered where it went and what it was. this wasnt the first ufo ive seen or the last one,ufo sightings and other paranormal things run in the family, basically all members from both my mothers and fathers side of the family have experienced ufo's and other things like ghosts.
content.summary: A bright pulsating ball of light that teleported through the sky
